articles.title: Macron criticises Trump’s threats to take over Greenland during visit
articles.description: French president is first foreign head of state to visit Arctic territory since US president made comments
articles.content:
Emmanuel Macron has criticised Donald Trump’s threats to take over Greenland as he became the first foreign head of state to visit the vast, mineral-rich Arctic territory since the US president began making explicit threats to annex it.
“I don’t thin... [3543 chars]

articles.title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Vijay Rupani’s body among 47 identified; ex-CM's state funeral Monday | Key updates
articles.description: The Gujarat government will hold a state funeral for former CM Vijay Rupani in Rajkot on Monday, coinciding with a day of state mourning. | Latest News India
articles.content: Three days after the crash of the London-bound Air India flight AI-171 in Gujarat's Ahmedabad, authorities confirmed the identification of 47 victims through DNA matching — including former Gujarat chief minister Vijay Rupani. SDRF and Police personn... [2888 chars]

articles.title: Trump vetoed Israel's plan to assassinate Iran's Supreme Leader: Report
articles.description: According to the top officials, Israel informed the US of an opportunity to assassinate Iran’s Supreme Leader but Trump vetoed the plan.
articles.content: US President Donald Trump vetoed an Israeli plan to assassinate Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, two US officials informed Reuters. One senior administration official was quoted saying, "Have the Iranians killed an American yet? No. Unti... [3190 chars]

articles.title: Trump says can broker Iran‑Israel peace using trade as he did with India‑Pakistan
articles.description: ISLAMABAD: US President Donald Trump said on Sunday he could use American trade leverage to broker a peace deal between Iran and Israel, drawing a parallel to his administration’s role in facilitating a ceasefire between India and Pakistan last month. The renewed conflict saw Iran and Israel exchanging missile and drone strikes over the past three days. Iranian officials

articles.title: John (Jack) Niland
articles.description: Cartron, Balla, Co. Mayo – peacefully, surrounded by his loving family on 15th June, 2025. Predeceased by his parents Tom and Nora (nee Connor) Niland, his brother Paddy Joe and sisters Maureen Mc Loughlin (nee Niland) and Martina Loftus (nee Niland). He will be sadly missed by his loving wife Sarah, daughters Fiona

articles.title: New portable testing device rapidly detects HIV and COVID-19 with high accuracy
articles.description: A new glowing virus test from Mass General Brigham called LUCAS offers fast, portable, and accurate results without lab tools or power.
articles.content: Scientists at Mass General Brigham have developed a powerful new tool called LUCAS (Luminescence CAscade-based Sensor). Unlike older virus detection tests, LUCAS is fast, portable, and incredibly accurate. It works by using an enzyme that creates a g... [5866 chars]

articles.title: Minnesota lawmaker shootings: Sibley County authorities issue emergency alert after suspect's vehicle found
articles.description: An emergency alert is in effect for an area in Sibley County where the Minnesota lawmaker shooting suspect's vehicle was found.
